name: SpaceBar (Broxly) (Broxly)
description:
SpaceBar is a stylish, fun to play endless fps shooter and platformer game... In each level there is amount of drones you have to kill while you are running as you can tell...

Your goal is go far as you can and  while doing this killing drones fow now. 

COMING FEATURES

Firstly, game will become more fun, more enjoyable and more unique.

  • We are wokring about making parkour easier but still challenging.  How about special movements ? (Of course not wall running or grapling... )
  • Another thing is, drones are so boring, arent they ? They will be better at next update!
  • Its a idea but how about a new opponent ??? Its not for this update, its still need a lot of work to be perfect. We just wanna know what you thinking about it ?
FINALLY

SpaceBar is currently Alpha 1.0, so your comments are so importent for us. 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/BroxlyMain

Discord: https://discord.gg/BHk6xWg

Give it a try. Thanks...
